WRITING.TEXT: There was this guy who had not got laid for sometime and so he went to a bar to get a girl to get laid with. Then he got a filthy thought in his mind maybe she has a hot looking daughter and he could convince her and her daughter to have a threesome with him. So he approached her table and soon enough they both started chatting and after a few drinks the guy told her about his fantasy of having a threesome with a mom and daughter. WRITING.TEXT:
80 year old Jim marrined 18 year old Linda and he was the towns envy. Soon Linda got pregnant and was at the hospital giving birth. The nurse told Jim,"Its amazing you managed to do this at your age". Jim replied,"well one has gotta keep the car and engine running"
Soon a year later they were at the hospital again with Linda giving birth to another one and nurse remarked,"wow its amazing yiu did it again" Jim replied,"as i said you gotta keep the car and egine running"
and again a year later Linda gave birth again and Jim told the nurse,"as i said you gotta keep the car and engine running" The nurse replied,"thats true but you might wanna change the engine oil as this one's black"

WRITING.TITLE: sexual exhaustion
WRITING.TEXT:
A teacher was wrapping up class, and started talking about tomorrow's final exam. He said there would be no excuses for not showing up tomorrow, barring a dire medical condition or an immediate family member's death. One smart ass, male student said, "What about extreme sexual exhaustion?", and the whole classroom burst into laughter.
After the laughter had subsided, the teacher glared at the student, and said, "Not an excuse, you can use your other hand to write."

WRITING.TITLE: The guy who wanted to marry an innocent virgin
WRITING.TEXT:
There was this philandering guy who after bedding 100s of gals decided to marry and settle down. The girl he wanted to marry should be young and beautiful but most importantly be an innocent virgin. He also wanted to teach her everything about sex;
To this his friend asked,"How are you gonna find out she is an innocent virgin?"
He replied."Simple, I will just show her penis and ask her what it is and if she answers right must mean she is well versed in matters of sex and hence not an innocent virgin!"
And so in his quest he dated a number of gals but all failed his tests.
Then one day at a supermarket checkout lane he saw this angelic looking beautiful girl and instantly fell in love with her and wanted to marry her but then reminded himself about the test. He somehow befriended the gal and dated her for a few times and one day he brought her home where both of them sat on the couch. He then stood up and told her he wanted to show her something and unzipped his pants and removed his penis and asked the gilr,"do you know what this is?"
The girl giggled a lot like a young teen and replied."thats a tadpole!"
The man was surprised at the reply and asked."are you sure this is a tadpole"
The giggled more and said."yes i am sure this is a tadpole"
The man was happy to hear that and came to conclusion this girl had to be an innocent virgin and immediately asked to marry her and she agreed.
After marriage it was the first time they both were in bed and so he undressed himself naked and told her,"Darling tonight I am going into initiate you into the beautiful world of sex and teach you all I know and to star with this thing you see here is called a penis"
The girl replied casually."yeah i know thats a penis, you think I am stupid or something"
The man who was shocked by now asked."but the other day you thought this was a tadpole"
The girl laughed and replied."well i had seen lots of pythons, bandicoots, frogs but never a tadpole"
